item.title: Reasoning About Knowledge on Regular Expressions is 2EXPTIME-complete
item.description: arXiv:2508.09784v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Logics for reasoning about knowledge and actions have seen many applications in various domains of multi-agent systems, including epistemic planning. Change of knowledge based on observations about the surroundings forms a key aspect in such planning ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> announcement, arxiv, reasoning, knowledge base, model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 40%</small>
